product_overview: ZMK Agency is a digital agency website designed to present services, pricing plans, and enable user inquiries through contact and quote forms, along with administrative lead management.
core_goals: Provide an intuitive and smooth navigation experience throughout the website.
Offer detailed, clear pricing options including Retainer and Project plans with an ROI Simulator.
Enable potential clients to easily submit project inquiries via a multi-step wizard form and a contact form.
Support administrative functions such as login and lead management via a dedicated dashboard.
Ensure the website is responsive, visually appealing, and free of errors across all supported devices.
key_features: Main navigation bar with seamless routing between Home, Services, Pricing, and Admin sections.
Service detail pages dynamically generated to provide comprehensive service information.
Pricing page featuring toggle between Monthly and Project plans, ROI Simulator, and Custom Quote integration.
Contact form saving user messages to Firebase for follow-up.
Multi-step wizard form to collect detailed project quote information from users.
Admin dashboard with secure login and lead detail modal for managing incoming leads.
Reusable SEO components for page metadata optimization.
Firebase backend integration for data storage and authentication.
user_flow_summary: User visits homepage and navigates through main sections via the navigation bar.
User views detailed service descriptions on individual service pages.
User explores pricing plans, toggles plan types, uses the ROI Simulator, and submits requests for custom quotes through the Pricing Wizard Form.
User submits inquiries via the contact form which are saved to Firebase.
Admin logs in to the dashboard, views lead summaries, and opens lead detail modals for follow-up.
404 page displayed on invalid routes to guide users back to main content.
validation_criteria: All navigation links function correctly without errors or broken routes.
Service detail pages load dynamically with correct content.
Pricing page toggle and plan selections operate smoothly and reflect accurate pricing information.
Contact and wizard forms validate user input before submission and save data successfully in Firebase.
Admin login authenticates users securely and dashboard operates without errors.
SEO metadata is present and correctly configured for all pages.
No console errors or warnings during normal website operation.
Responsive design works well on different screen sizes and devices.
404 page appears appropriately for invalid URLs.
